name: Pumpkin Brew!
description:
• Use A and D to move
  • SPACE or W to jump
  • E to pick up or throw pumpkin
  • S to pick up or drop pumpkin
  • ESC to restart level

This whole idea is based on our love for some old puzzle platformers, like Moai-kun <3

We had some more ideas on mind but due to the limited time frame and the amount of levels we tried to do, we did not have time to expand more on the mechanics.
